page.title: 02NEWS WK.ENDING JUNE 14th.'85
page.content: Local newspaper _weekly Dunfermline Press.(1)Culross girl on front page this week.Dancer Debbie Warne has graduated from High School for Perfor_ ming Arts,Texas.(2)A network of sign_ posts showing pretty and historic routes has been set up in Culross_the brainchild of Mr.Roy McCormack of the Community Council. Culross may soon have its own news- sheet.Mrs.Ishbel Robertson,editor,is planning the first edition this autumn.It will be printed by the in- mates of H.M.Prison for Women,Corton- vale,Bridge-of-Allan.The women give this service free and in return get practice in typing,etc.for "O"level and "A"level exams.They also become interested in what is happening in our community in particular and life outside prison in general.
